title: fix link to noreply email docs
author: djbrown
details: Updated the documentation link for the GitHub-provided `noreply` email address.
summary:
- Updated the documentation link for the GitHub-provided `noreply` email address.
- Changed the URL from `/managing-email-preferences/setting-your-commit-email-address#about-no-reply-email` to `/reference/email-addresses-reference#your-noreply-email-address`.
generated_title: Fix broken noreply email link in user settings documentation
commits: **7562455**: fix link to noreply email address (by Daniel Brown)
original_description:
<!--
Thank you for contributing to this project! You must fill out the information below before we can review this pull request. By explaining why you're making a change (or linking to an issue) and what changes you've made, we can triage your pull request to the best possible team for review.
-->

### Why:

on [Setting your email address for every repository on your computer](https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/how-tos/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-email-preferences/setting-your-commit-email-address#setting-your-email-address-for-every-repository-on-your-computer) step 2 and [Setting your email address for a single repository](https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/how-tos/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-email-preferences/setting-your-commit-email-address?platform=linux#setting-your-email-address-for-a-single-repository) step 3 the link to [GitHub-provided `noreply` email address](https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-email-preferences/setting-your-commit-email-address#about-no-reply-email) leads to the same page, even though there is no further information about noreply on that page. The [uri fragment](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/URI/Reference/Fragment) `#about-no-reply-email` indicates that the content was previously there but moved to the separate reference page [Your `noreply` email address](https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/reference/email-addresses-reference#your-noreply-email-address).

<!-- Paste the issue link or number here -->
Closes: 

<!-- If there's an existing issue for your change, please link to it above.
If there's _not_ an existing issue, please open one first to make it more likely that this update will be accepted: https://github.com/github/docs/issues/new/choose. -->

### What's being changed (if available, include any code snippets, screenshots, or gifs):

If you made changes to the `content` directory, a table will populate in a comment below with links to the review and current production articles. -->

- [x] The changes in this PR meet [the docs fundamentals that are required for all content](http://docs.github.com/en/contributing/writing-for-github-docs/about-githubs-documentation-fundamentals).
- [x] All CI checks are passing and the changes look good in the [review environment](https://laughing-orbit-6994xv955773x4pv-4000.app.github.dev/en/account-and-profile/how-tos/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-email-preferences/setting-your-commit-email-address).
